Port Nyanzaru.jpg|''On the right side of a bustling market street in Port Nyanzaru, a small dinosaur stands with a muzzle around its snout.''
</gallery>

document_data.Description: Muzzles often consisted of [[leather]] straps and metal buckles. Muzzled creatures were capable of breathing, but they could not bite or eat.
document_data.Varieties: There existed some [[magical item|magical]] muzzles that would expand or contract so that they could fit any creature.
document_data.Notable Users:
* In the land of [[Halruaa]], the land's [[Halruaan behir|domestic behirs]] often had muzzles put on them that were made of leather and [[electrum]].<ref>
* In [[Chult]], most events in the [[dinosaur races]] of [[Port Nyanzaru]] required that the racing [[dinosaur]]s be muzzled.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, five [[bear]]s roused from their annual hibernation by overzealous hunters were led in short [[leash]]ed muzzles through the streets of [[Zhentil Keep]] as the front of a procession of captive beasts, monsters, and sentient beings, as part of a [[Cyricist]] religious festival.<ref>
